languages.text: "Оно и значит, Ваше Светлишество. Отметили тебя печаткой, не отметили — все равно после Пряток пропадешь. Отсюда как из гроксовой ямы, назад дороги нет. А я жить хочу, пользу приносить. Пустите меня обратно, умоляю!"

"Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go home!"
languages.original_text: "Оно и значит, Ваше Светлишество. Отметили тебя печаткой, не отметили — все равно после Пряток пропадешь. Отсюда как из гроксовой ямы, назад дороги нет. А я жить хочу, пользу приносить. Пустите меня обратно, умоляю!"

traits.locale_text: "Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go back!"

"Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go back!"

"Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go home!"

"Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go home!"

"Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go home!"

"Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go home!"

languages.text: “就是字面上的意思，大人。无论你身上有没有被打下印记，都不重要。只要这场狩猎结束，你就死定了。这地方就像个粪坑一样，根本没有退路。可我想活下去，我想当个有用的人。求您了，求求您，让我回家吧！”
languages.original_text: "Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go home!"

traits.locale_text: “就是字面上的意思，大人。无论你身上有没有被打下印记，都不重要。只要这场狩猎结束，你就死定了。这地方就像个粪坑一样，根本没有退路。可我想活下去，我想当个有用的人。求您了，求求您，让我回家吧！”

languages.text: 「それだけなんだよ、ありがたき方。刻印を押されるかどうかなんて関係ない。狩りが終わったら、あんたは消えちまう。ここは蜥蜴牛の飼育場みたいなもんで、戻る道なんかない。けど私は生きたい。誰かの役に立ちたいんだ。頼むから、どうか家に帰らせて！」
languages.original_text: "Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go home!"

traits.locale_text: 「それだけなんだよ、ありがたき方。刻印を押されるかどうかなんて関係ない。狩りが終わったら、あんたは消えちまう。ここは蜥蜴牛の飼育場みたいなもんで、戻る道なんかない。けど私は生きたい。誰かの役に立ちたいんだ。頼むから、どうか家に帰らせて！」

languages.text: «Eso mismo, Excelencia. No importa si te marcan o no; una vez concluida la cacería, ya no se te vuelve a ver. Este sitio es como un foso de grox; no hay vuelta atrás. Pero yo quiero vivir, quiero ser útil. ¡Se lo suplico, deje que me vaya a casa!».
languages.original_text: "Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go home!"

traits.locale_text: «Eso mismo, Excelencia. No importa si te marcan o no; una vez concluida la cacería, ya no se te vuelve a ver. Este sitio es como un foso de grox; no hay vuelta atrás. Pero yo quiero vivir, quiero ser útil. ¡Se lo suplico, deje que me vaya a casa!».

languages.text: "Öyle işte {mf|beyim|hanımım}. Mesele damgalanmak değil, av bitince işin de bitmiş demektir. Burası groks çukurundan hâllice, bir girdin mi çıkış yoktur. Ben yaşamak istiyorum, işe yaramak istiyorum. Yalvarırım, bırakın da evime döneyim!"
languages.original_text: "Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go home!"

traits.locale_text: "Öyle işte {mf|beyim|hanımım}. Mesele damgalanmak değil, av bitince işin de bitmiş demektir. Burası groks çukurundan hâllice, bir girdin mi çıkış yoktur. Ben yaşamak istiyorum, işe yaramak istiyorum. Yalvarırım, bırakın da evime döneyim!"

languages.text: « Rien de plus que ce que je vous ai dit. Peu importe qu'on nous appose une marque ou non. Une fois la chasse terminée, c'en est fini de nous. Cet endroit est comme une fosse aux grox. Pas moyen d'en réchapper. Mais je veux vivre, je veux me rendre utile. Je vous en supplie, laissez-moi rentrer chez moi ! »
languages.original_text: "Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go home!"

traits.locale_text: « Rien de plus que ce que je vous ai dit. Peu importe qu'on nous appose une marque ou non. Une fois la chasse terminée, c'en est fini de nous. Cet endroit est comme une fosse aux grox. Pas moyen d'en réchapper. Mais je veux vivre, je veux me rendre utile. Je vous en supplie, laissez-moi rentrer chez moi ! »

languages.text: "Genau das, Euer Gnaden. Es spielt keine Rolle, ob Ihr gebrandmarkt werdet oder nicht – sobald die Jagd vorbei ist, seid Ihr verloren. Dieser Ort ist wie eine Grox-Grube – es gibt kein Zurück. Aber ich will leben, ich will nützlich sein. Bitte, bitte, lasst mich nach Hause gehen!"
languages.original_text: "Just that, Your Graciousness. It doesn't matter if you get branded or not — once the hunt is over, you're gone. This place is like a grox pit — there's no way back. But I want to live, I want to be useful. Please, please let me go home!"

traits.locale_text: "Genau das, Euer Gnaden. Es spielt keine Rolle, ob Ihr gebrandmarkt werdet oder nicht – sobald die Jagd vorbei ist, seid Ihr verloren. Dieser Ort ist wie eine Grox-Grube – es gibt kein Zurück. Aber ich will leben, ich will nützlich sein. Bitte, bitte, lasst mich nach Hause gehen!"
